00143     template<typename T> bool copyToMem( T *dst, size_t len, scaling_pair scaling = scaling_pair() )const {
00144         ValuePtr<T> cont( dst, len, typename ValuePtr<T>::NonDeleter() );
00145         return copyTo( cont, scaling );
00146     }
00147 
00158     template<typename T> bool copyFromMem( const T *const src, size_t len, scaling_pair scaling = scaling_pair() ) {
00159         ValuePtr<T> cont( const_cast<T *>( src ), len, typename ValuePtr<T>::NonDeleter() ); //its ok - we're no going to change it
00160         return cont.copyTo( *this, scaling );
00161     }

00177     template<typename T> ValuePtr<T> copyAs( scaling_pair scaling = scaling_pair() )const {
00178         Reference erg = copyByID( ValuePtr<T>::staticID, scaling );
00179         return erg.isEmpty() ? ValuePtr<T>( 0 ) : erg->castToValuePtr<T>();
00180     }

00210         return erg.isEmpty() ? ValuePtr<T>( 0 ) : erg->castToValuePtr<T>();
